```{r, echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
if (params$tabs) {
  cat('## Depletion {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}' )
} else {
  cat('## Depletion')
}

dd <- Pars$M_ageArray %>% dim()
nsim <- dd[1]
maxage <- dd[2]

nsamp <- length(its)


```

### Sampled Parameters 
Histograms of `r nsim` simulations of depletion (spawning biomass in the last historical year over average unfished spawning biomass; `D`), with vertical colored lines indicating `r nsamp` randomly drawn values.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
par(mfrow=c(2,3))
hist2(Pars$D, col=plotPars$col, axes=plotPars$axes, main="Depletion (D)", breaks=plotPars$breaks)
abline(v=Pars$D[its], col=1:nsamp, lwd=plotPars$lwd)
axis(side=1)  
```
